New Records: Dasun Shanaka scored the fastest fifty by a Sri Lankan in men's T20Is (20 balls)
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka scored 206/6 in their 20 overs, India were reduced to 57 for 5 in the 10th over, Suryakumar Yadav and Axar Patel staged a fightback adding 91 runs for the sixth wicket, Dasun Shanaka picked up two wickets in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and decided to bowl first to avoid fielding in the dew later on
Post-Match Reflections: Axar Patel tried his absolute best with both bat and ball, but Dasun Shanaka continued his all-round domination of India to bring up a 16-run win for Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep Singh bowled five no-balls in his two overs, changing the complexion of the game
Others: Kusal Mendis scored 52 off 31, Suryakumar Yadav scored 51 off 33, Umran Malik took 2 wickets, Kasun Rajitha took 2 wickets
